content:
Jerod turns Adam into Lego, a Walrus, and a Walrus in the style of Studio Ghibli...and so much more. This is a good one to watch on YouTube. :link: https://changelog.am/87

Ch Start Title Runs
01 00:00 Let's talk! 00:38
02 00:38 Sponsor: Augment Code 03:09
03 03:47 Adam forgets about Min browser!! 01:36
04 05:23 OpenAI 4o Image Generation 03:55
05 09:18 In the style of Studio Ghibli 06:20
06 15:38 OpenAI image gen model vs Apple GenMoji 05:49
07 21:27 The AI layer 01:41
08 23:08 Sponsor: Depot 02:20
09 25:28 Jerod got ChatGPT to work finally 03:29
10 28:58 Private AI is watching you 05:22
11 34:19 Where are they now? 01:54
12 36:14 Where is Haml, Sass and Compass now? 04:23
13 40:36 Where is Go now? 04:05
14 44:41 Where is MongoDB now? 00:46
15 45:27 Sponsor: Notion 03:08
16 48:35 Is this an ad or interview? 11:16
17 59:51 Turn him into a Studio Ghibli character 02:42
18 1:02:33 Adam is a big fan of near beer 05:15
19 1:07:48 More comments are welcome 00:30
20 1:08:18 Closing thoughts and stuff 01:49

RE: ad or interview

I have found the interviews with CEO/CTOs of product companies quite interesting and generally haven’t felt like ads.

One thing I have noticed is that I enjoy the ads quite a bit more when it is a conversation. Some folks who do ads on Changelog seem to try to cram as much in as they can and it’s not a conversation at all. Those ones are far less compelling than ads that have a good back-and-forth conversation, something that I have only heard on Changelog.

Agreed. There was one ad that I was like lady shut up already lol. Forgot what the product was. They were over explaining the features or whatever.

What I like about the conversational ads is I can skip them when I already heard it before. Like I've heard from David at Retool already so I'm well aware of the person and product. Skip! When I hear new people I listen again.

I don't always skip but knowing the person and product helps when I want to skip.
I'm kind of sad this wasn't titled "I am The Walrus"
